original: dpal ye shes yon tan bzang po zhes bya ba'i bstod pa /
analyzed: dpal ye shes yon tan bzang po zhes bya ba'i bstod pa /

original: bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Blessed One Ma√±jugho·π£a.

original: gang gi blo gros sgrib gnyis sprin bral nyi ltar rnam dag rab gsal ba //
analyzed: gang gi blo gros sgrib gnyis sprin bral nyi ltar rnam dag rab gsal ba //
translated: Your intelligence, free from the clouds of the two obscurations, is as bright as the sun,

original: ji snyed don kun ji bzhin gzigs phyir nyid kyi thugs kar glegs bam 'dzin //
analyzed: ji snyed don kun ji bzhin gzigs phyir nyid kyi thugs kar glegs bam 'dzin //
translated: and you hold a scripture in your heart because you see all objects of knowledge just as they are.

original: gang dag srid pa'i btson rar ma rig mun 'thoms sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba'i //
analyzed: gang dag srid pa'i btson rar ma rig mun 'thoms sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba'i //
translated: For all those in the prison of existence, confused by the darkness of ignorance and oppressed by suffering,

original: 'gro tshogs kun la bu gcig ltar brtse yan lag drug cu'i dbyangs ldan gsung //
analyzed: 'gro tshogs kun la bu gcig ltar brtse yan lag drug cu'i dbyangs ldan gsung //
translated: you have a voice with sixty melodious tones, loving them as if they were your only child.

original: 'brug ltar cher sgrogs nyon mongs gnyid slong las kyi lcags sgrog 'grol mdzad cing //
analyzed: 'brug ltar cher sgrogs nyon mongs gnyid slong las kyi lcags sgrog 'grol mdzad cing //
translated: Your voice resounds like thunder, rousing those asleep due to afflictions and freeing them from the iron chains of karma.

original: ma rig mun sel sdug bsngal myu gu ji snyed gcod mdzad ral gri bsnams //
analyzed: ma rig mun sel sdug bsngal myu gu ji snyed gcod mdzad ral gri bsnams //
translated: You hold a sword that cuts away all the sprouts of suffering and dispels the darkness of ignorance.

original: gdod nas dag cing sa bcu'i mthar son yon tan lus rdzogs rgyal sras sku //
analyzed: gdod nas dag cing sa bcu'i mthar son yon tan lus rdzogs rgyal sras sku //
translated: The body of the Bodhisattva, who has reached the end of the ten stages, is originally pure and endowed with all the virtues.

original: bcu phrag bcu dang bcu gnyis rgyan spras bdag blo'i mun sel khyod la 'dud //
analyzed: bcu phrag bcu dang bcu gnyis rgyan spras bdag blo'i mun sel khyod la 'dud //
translated: Adorned with the thirty-two and the eighty minor marks, I bow down to you, who dispel the darkness of my mind.

original: gang zhig lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pas gcig dang bdun dang / nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / brgya dang / stong la sogs pa dag nyin re bzhin du sgrogs pa de ni go rims ji lta ba bzhin du /
analyzed: gang zhig lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pas gcig dang bdun dang / nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / brgya dang / stong la sogs pa dag nyin re bzhin du sgrogs pa de ni go rims ji lta ba bzhin du /
translated: He who proclaims the one, the seven, the twenty-one, the hundred, the thousand, etc., every day with a pure superior intention, will, in due order,

original: sgrib pa 'dag pa dang / thos pa 'dzin pa dang / spobs pa dang / mi brjed pa'i gzungs dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad 'joms @79a * //
analyzed: sgrib pa 'dag pa dang / thos pa 'dzin pa dang / spobs pa dang / mi brjed pa'i gzungs dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad 'joms @79a * //
translated: purify his obscurations, retain what he has heard, have eloquence, the power of retention which does not forget, and the faculty and power of wisdom which overcomes all adversaries.

original: pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po dang stobs la sogs pa yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po dang stobs la sogs pa yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will be endowed with immeasurable qualities such as these.

original: gang zhig nyin re bzhin du lan gsum du bstod pa byed pa de ni ji skad bshad pa'i yon tan de dag dang ldan pas shes rab dang snying rje lam dang sa rnams rim gyis bgrod de /
analyzed: gang zhig nyin re bzhin du lan gsum du bstod pa byed pa de ni ji skad bshad pa'i yon tan de dag dang ldan pas shes rab dang snying rje lam dang sa rnams rim gyis bgrod de /
translated: Whoever recites this praise three times each day will come to possess the qualities explained here. He will traverse the grounds and paths of wisdom and compassion.

original: gong nas gong du ches cher 'phags nas myur du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i grong khyer du phyin nas 'gro ba ma lus pa 'khor ba las sgrol ba'i ded dpon chen por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gong nas gong du ches cher 'phags nas myur du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i grong khyer du phyin nas 'gro ba ma lus pa 'khor ba las sgrol ba'i ded dpon chen por 'gyur ro //
translated: Having become ever more exalted, he will quickly reach the city of omniscience and become a great captain who liberates all beings from samsara.

original: dpal ye shes yon tan bzang po zhe bya ba'i bstod pa /
analyzed: dpal ye shes yon tan bzang po zhe bya ba'i bstod pa /
translated: The Praise Called ‚ÄúThe Good Qualities of Glorious Wisdom‚ÄùüîΩis finished.
